description:
Tree works to various trees (G2) in rear garden subject to rear of 56 Crouch Hill No.71 TPO 1986. 

 (A)     Rear of No.1:-         Sycamore - Crown lift 6m, crown thin 35%.         Sycamore - remove horizontal laterals growing         towards building.         Hawthorn (shrub) - remove.         Twin Sycamore - Clean up old stumps, crown reduce         20%, cut back to allow clearance of 2.5m from         gutter. 

 (B)     Rear of No.4:-         Hawthorn - Crown reduce 30%.         Sycamore - clean up stumps, crown reduce 20% clear         building by 2.5m. 

 (C)     Rear of No.7:-         Large Sycamore - crown thin 25%.         Small Sycamore - crown reduce 20%.         Small leanding Sycamore - fell. 

 (D)     Front Garden:-         Sycamore - cut back to allow clearance of 2m, crown         thin 30%.  Remove stumps.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
